https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A3QOWmYuN52ZhMMy1q2I49Qohio.jpg Year 2060. Climate predictions made at the beginning of the 21st century have turned out to be dramatically true: global warming of the Earth's atmosphere now has serious consequences on the every day lives of our grandchildren. Changing Climates, Changing Times
